message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for someone with your expertise.  I'm initially proposing a price of $1,800,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I would like to make a counteroffer at $1,400,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your constraints, but $1,400,000 is significantly below what I can accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,600,000? This offer stands as a testament to my desire to see this deal through with you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While I understand your position, I must adhere to my budgetary constraints. I would like to propose a counteroffer at $1,500,000. I hope this brings us closer to an agreement that respects both our interests.
